info.instructions: The object of this logic game is very simple: arrange the colored pieces on the board so that no two pieces of the same color are adjacent (horizontally, vertically, or diagonally).

Each round, you have a certain number of moves to complete this task, and any moves you have a left at the end of the round will result in a bonus score. If you are unable to complete the board within the allotted number of moves, your game will be over. Each round, the board gets bigger.
To adjust the board, simply drag a piece and drop it on to another piece; this will switch the two pieces involved. You may switch any two pieces on the board; they need not be adjacent.
